2015 Mercedes Benz C180 Avantgarde Auto with “BALANCE OF MAINTENANCE PLAN till 12/02/2023 or 100 000kms whichever one comes first.

Boot lid convenience closing feature
, Cruise Control, Multi-Functional Leather Steering with Paddle Shift Gear Change, Comfort Suspension and many more.
